Instruccion: Look at the pictures. Unscramble the sentences.

opciones: bouncy / and / Gilly /castle / playing / are / Gerald / a / on /
respuestas: Gerald and Gilly are playing on a bouncy castle.

opciones: aren't / They / on / riding / the / carousel. / eating / They / cream / ice / are
respuestas: They aren't riding on the carousel. They are eating ice cream.

opciones: Are / some / they / now / popcorn / buying?.
respuestas: Are they buying some popcorn now?

opciones: your / Hold / balloon / the top of the bottle / . / next to
respuestas: Hold your balloon next to the top of the bottle.

opciones: balloon / your / . / with your hand / Hit
respuestas: Hit your balloon with your hand.
